scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp X-Genesys-RM-Application-dbid: 792 X-Genesys-GVP-Session-ID: [call_id];gvp.rm.tenant-id=224_tts X-Genesys-Speech-Engine-TTS: default Supported: timer, uui Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 3 1 IN IP4 172.24.134.168 s=GVP MrcpV2 Client c=IN IP4 172.24.134.168 m=application 9 TCP/MRCPv2 1 a=setup:active a=connection:existing a=resource:speechrecog a=cmid:1 m=audio 45536 RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 pcmu/8000 a=recvonly a=mid:1

ACK [$4] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Route[$6] Content-Length: 0

BYE [$4] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Route[$6] Content-Length: 0
